org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.utils

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.utils.Timer

  • public class Timer
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple timer implementation wrapping Timer.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini
    See Also:
    Timer

    • Constructor Detail

      • Timer

        public Timer(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
             int delay,
             int period)
        Constructor that creates a timer that will run the given Runnable every period after an initial delay. This does not start the timer.
        Parameters:
        runnable - the code to be run.
        delay - initial delay in milliseconds.
        period - period in milliseconds
        See Also:
        start(), Timer.schedule(TimerTask, long, long)

    • Method Detail

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the timer.
        See Also:
        Timer.cancel(), Timer.purge()

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the timer.
        See Also:
        Timer.Timer(), TimerTask, Timer.schedule(TimerTask, long, long)

      • setHandler

        public void setHandler(android.os.Handler handler)
        Sets the handler in which the Runnable shold run.
